name.title: Platform Name
name.description: Name of the platform as it appears in Homebridge

thermostatIP.title: Thermostat IP Address
thermostatIP.description: IP address of your Lennox thermostat on the local network (required for local control mode)

connectionMode.title: Connection Mode
connectionMode.description: Connection mode: 'auto' (use local if IP provided, else cloud), 'local' (force local control), 'cloud' (force cloud control)

username.title: Username
username.description: Your Lennox iComfort account email address (required for cloud mode only)

password.title: Password
password.description: Your Lennox iComfort account password (required for cloud mode only)

pollingInterval.title: Polling Interval (seconds)
pollingInterval.description: How often to poll for status updates (30-300 seconds)

temperatureUnit.title: Temperature Unit
temperatureUnit.description: Temperature display unit (auto uses system preference)
